title: Did a Producer Claim Kevin Spacey ‘Drugged and Raped’ Justin Bieber?
subtitle: Although Spacey has been accused by multiple people of sexual abuse, the claim that he 'drugged and raped' Justin Bieber is unfounded.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A film producer claimed actor Kevin Spacey had "drugged and raped" Justin Bieber.
